scripts.docker:up: cd infra && docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml up
scripts.docker:up:build: cd infra && docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml up --build
scripts.docker:up:build:no-cache: cd infra && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml up --build
scripts.deps:install: cd backend && pnpm install && cd .. && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ..
scripts.deps:install:frozen-lockfile: cd backend && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile && cd .. && cd frontend && pnpm i --frozen-lockfile && cd ..
scripts.deps:update: cd backend && pnpm update && cd .. && cd frontend && pnpm update && cd ..
